sqlMap.select: SELECT 'inetOrgPerson' objectClass, pers."ID", pers."UID", pers."SN", pers."GIVENNAME", pers."CN", pers."MAIL", pers."GIVENNAME", pers."ADDRESS", pers."TELEPHONENUMBER", pers."CARLICENSE" FROM csvdata pers WHERE pers."MAIL" LIKE #mail#
SELECT pers."MAIL" AS mail FROM csvdata pers
SELECT pers."ID" AS ID FROM csvdata pers WHERE pers."MAIL" LIKE #mail#
